item.title: Python
item.description: Cheat Sheet # Python terminal: python3 in cmd. Comments: # at the start of any line. Print: print("Stay Safeâ€¦) Indentation: must be followed. Examples # Example 1 # num = 5 print(num) returns 5 type(num) <class 'int'> Example 2 # num = 5.0 print(num) returns 5 type(num) <class 'float'> Example 3 # greet = "Hello user" print(greet) returns: 'Hello user' type(greet) <class 'str'> Example 4 # is_available = True print(is_available) returns: True type(is_available) returns: <class 'bool'> Example 5 # num = None print(num) returns: None type(num) returns: <class 'NoType'> Operators # + - * / % ** // = += -= *= /= == !

item.title: Skullcandy Crusher ANC
item.description: Controls, Personal Sound Profiles, Tile Tracker support.
